title: FS FT T206 Mathewson Black Cap PSA 5
author: bundy462

posts.post_title: FS FT T206 Mathewson Black Cap PSA 5
posts.post_content:
I've decided to update this posting to expand my trade list and also to put prices on my cards for outright sale.

Up for sale or trade, fully insured shipping is included.  Payment via PayPal gift or money owed unless other arrangements are made before payment:

1. T206 Cobb Bat on Shoulder PSA 3 - slight printer freak (too much orange in skin tones, hard line between shades in sky) - SOLD

2. T206 Cobb Red Portrait PSA 3.5 - SOLD

3. T206 Mathewson Dark Cap PSA 5 - $1075

4. 33 Goudey Ott #127 PSA 3 - SOLD

5. T206 Cy Young Bare Hand - Sovereign back - SOLD

My want list (for consideration as part of trades or if anyone has for outright sale).  All T206, looking for PSA 4 grade only:

Mordecai Brown - all poses
Cobb - all poses
Ed Collins
Crawford - all poses
WaJo - portrait
Lajoie - all poses
Matty - black cap
Speaker
Waddell - all poses
Ed Walsh
Cy Young - all poses
Bump...added prices for outright sale, added back scans, expanded wanted list for buying or trading.

bump

Red Cobb sold.  Still 4 remaining.  Outright sale or trades, throw something out there...
Cy Young sold, thanks Ian.  Still 3 remaining.  Would love to find a trade out there for some PSA 4s.
